title: Sentinel 1.0
description:
This is: Sentinel 1.0

Got this as part of The Starry Nights Bundle. Not to be confused with that 2004 adventure game of the same-ish name. Audio + TD. Check it if interested!
--------------------------------------

Description:
Sentinel is an interactive audio tower defense game. It mixes strategic gameplay with a dynamic music system. The game takes place on a sequencer-like grid. As you add defenses, collect resources and destroy enemies, musical elements are triggered in time to the music. It is inspired by music games such as Rez, Lumines and Soundshapes.


Minimum Requirements:
2.0Ghz CPU
1.5Gb RAM
Widescreen monitor
Graphics card with SM 2.0+
Windows XP or later
Warning: this game contains mild strobe lighting.
